property.name: videoType
property.label: Video type
property.description: Denotes the type of video with a choice of vimeo and youtube.

property.name: videoId
property.label: Video ID
property.description: The identifier of the video on the video service.

property.name: description
property.label: Description
property.description: Longer description of the video in a few sentences or paragraphs. Leave empty to get a slot in LWR.

property.name: caption
property.label: Caption
property.description: Title that's shown below the video.

property.name: duration
property.label: Duration
property.description: Indicates how long the video runs for. Please add metric.

property.name: transcript
property.label: Transcript
property.default: The new Queensland Government is helping kids get active and play their favourite sport with $200 Play On! Sports Vouchers. There's heaps of sports to play all across Queensland, from the city to the country, in winter or summer, for families with kids aged 5 to 17. To find out more, search Play On!

property.name: transcriptLink
property.label: Transcript link
property.description: Provide a URL if the transcript is not included.

property.name: layout
property.label: Layout
property.description: Pick how you would like the player to be laid out with a choice of stack, stack centered, two-column top and two-column centered.

property.name: cstyle
property.label: Colour style
property.description: Pick the player background with a choice of default, dark, light, alternate, and dark-alternate.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
